explains: adj. 冷淡的，不关心的；中等的，平庸的；一般的，相当差的；中立的；不分化的

sentences.en: He was mute, distant, and indifferent.
sentences.cn: 他缄默无言，对人疏远而且冷漠。

sentences.en: She had starred in several very indifferent movies.
sentences.cn: 她领衔主演过好几部非常平庸的电影。

sentences.en: Her dull and indifferent husband replied that he had not.
sentences.cn: 她那迟钝而冷漠的丈夫回答说他没有。
